premise_source_doc_sentence: George Orson Welles  (  -LSB- ˈwɛlz -RSB- May 6 , 1915 -- October 10 , 1985  )  was an American actor , director , writer , and producer who worked in theatre , radio , and film .

claim: Orson Welles was a Shakespearean stage director.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is remembered for his innovative work in all three : in theatre , most notably Caesar  (  1937  )  , a Broadway adaptation of William Shakespeare 's Julius Caesar ; in radio , the legendary 1938 broadcast `` The War of the Worlds '' ; and in film , Citizen Kane  (  1941  )  , consistently ranked as one of the all-time greatest films .

claim: Orson Welles was a Shakespearean stage director.

claim: Orson Welles was a Shakespearean stage director.
